PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SwitchingDeviceTypeCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IEC 441-14-01: A switching device is a device designed to make or break the current in one or more electric circuits.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfGangs
PropertyDef.Definition: Number of gangs/buttons on this switch

PropertyDef.Name: SwitchFunction
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates types of switches which differs in functionality

PropertyDef.Name: HasLock
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication of whether a switching device has a key operated lock (=TRUE) or not (= FALSE)
